descriptionHtml:
[center][size=+4][b]NORDIC ROUND SHIELD[/size][/b][/center]
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35664-1-1367714327.jpg[/img][/center]


[b][size=+1]DESCRIPTION:[/size][/b] 

My first mod for Skyrim so I thought I would keep it simple to get used to the engine, this is the result. A simple Nordic styled round shield for those who like the Nordic race of Skyrim and want something a touch more \"Viking\" in flavour to the original shield selection while hopefully keeping it Lore friendly.  


[b][size=+1]INSTALLATION:[/size][/b] 

Either via Nexus Mod Manager 

[b]Or[/b]

Extract the rar file to your Skyrim installation directory. 


[b][size=+1]UNINSTALL:[/size][/b]  

Simply delete the installed files from your Skyrim installation directory or remove the mod with Nexus Mod Manager. 


[b][size=+1]INGAME:[/size][/b]  

The Nordic Round Shield can be crafted at any forge using the same recipe as the original Iron Shield. 

[list][*][b]1 x Leather Strips
[*]4 x Iron Ingot[/b][/list]

The shield can also be upgraded/tempered with 

[list][*][b]1 x Iron Ingot[/b][/list]

Stats are the same as the original iron shield. 

[list][*][b]Armor Rating: 20
[*]Weight: 12 
[*]Value: 60[/b][/list]
author: Fortran
